description: The Seattle Seahawks have set up a defense to prevent 49er fans from buying tickets to this weekend's game.

title: Seahawks ticket sales banned in California
contentencoded:
The San Francisco Chronicle is reporting today that the Seattle Seahawks, against whom the Chronicle's hometown 49ers will kick off for the NFC championship this weekend, won't sell tickets to the game to anyone using a credit card with a California address.

Only credit-card using residents of Oregon, Washington, Montana, Idaho, Alaska and Hawaii will be tolerated at CenturyLink field, apparently.
